name: It's raining cabbages
description:
The fuck is this game??!

Cabbages are falling from the sky. The bees collect and bring them to the factory. The factory transforms cabbages into coleslaw salads. Improve your factory and bees to some crazy speeds. Will you be able to find a lion? ;)

The game runs even when you're not playing. You can even close the game and come back later to collect the work of your factory, bees and lions.


Troubles?

Are you running the latest build? You should see v130 on the title screen. If not, refresh! If the problem persist, ask on the community page.

If you have trouble playing on a mobile device, this link should help you:

[Play on mobile device] Community

Join the group (English or French) at http://on.fb.me/1xBtToE and tell me what you think! Send suggestions, tell me about problems, etc.


Why this game?

It's Raining Cabbages is the result of just me being addicted to Cookie Clicker and Clicker Heroes. Right now, it's just a silly prototype that I work on during my free time. Many more improvements to come, based on YOUR suggestions.

-narF


Updated July 16, 2016 (v130)

See all release notes.

Thank you for playing!
